snippet: I see improvement since the restaurant was open. Until now the mamak restaurant has 3 lot in a row to make the restaurant bigger. They also has renovate the interior to make it look beautiful and clean. The food is okay. Not bad at all. The special part is the food quantity. You'll get a big amount in a plate. Also the food not expensive. This place is good for a family to grab a snack. Parking is not much. Sometimes you have to park far away. The waiter is all friendly. But sometimes lazy. This place also has an air conditioned room. So no problem to sit there doing an assignment.
